solution: THE END AND AIM OF SPYING IN ALL ITS FIVE VARIETIES IS KNOWLEDGE OF THE ENEMY; AND THIS KNOWLEDGE CAN ONLY BE DERIVED, IN THE FIRST INSTANCE, FROM THE CONVERTED SPY. HENCE IT IS ESSENTIAL THAT THE CONVERTED SPY BE TREATED WITH THE UTMOST LIBERALITY.
